AI Description: Gemma is a software package for genome-wide association analysis in a mixed model framework. It can efficiently handle large-scale genotype data for a wide range of genetic analysis.
Core Features:
1. Genome-wide association analysis
2. Mixed model framework
3. Efficient handling of large-scale genotype data
4. Wide range of genetic analysis capabilities
General Tags: Genome-Wide Association Analysis, Genetic Analysis, Mixed Model Framework
